title: Multisorb Technologies to Attend InnoPack 2015
text:
Multisorb Technologies to Attend InnoPack 2015 Wednesday, September 23, 2015 by Multisorb Technologies Print Email 
Multisorb Technologies will be attending InnoPack from 13-15 October in Madrid, Spain. 
InnoPack, an international packaging show for the pharmaceutical industry, is part of CPhI Worldwide 2015, the world's leading pharmaceutical networking and sourcing event. 
Multisorb will be at booth #4C41. 
With more than 50 years of experience developing sorbent solutions to help stabilise and optimise medicine shelf life, Multisorb delivers end-to-end solutions that allow pharmaceutical companies to drive their profits through sorbent technology. 
Multisorb's Healthcare Packaging Group vice-president Adrian Possumato said: "In today's challenging marketplace, sorbent technology represents an untapped area for many companies to increase profits. 
"At Multisorb, our Success through Efficiency programme helps companies to quickly identify, select, and dispense the optimal sorbent to achieve cost savings through efficiency and quality." 
Multisorb's SimulSorb and SimulOx simulation programmes use QbD-based modelling to quickly identify the optimal sorbent required to achieve the desired shelf life for pharmaceutical formulations. 
Since 2004, this technology has helped pharmaceutical companies reduce their development time by six to 12 months, eliminating costly sorbent ranging studies. 
Once the required sorbent is identified, Multisorb's technical team helps select the best platform for the packaging presentation or device to deliver the lowest possible net packaging cost. 
Using our systems approach, sorbent packet and canister solutions are then paired with corresponding dispensers specifically designed by Multisorb engineers. 
The result is an industry leading output efficiency of >99.997% for dispensers and the lowest total cost of ownership, while protecting sorbent capacity and minimising waste. Follow Us:
